Package pl.programmersrest.blog.model.service

Interface SubCommentService

  • public interface SubCommentService
    Provides basic operation on sub comments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addNewSubComment​(long postId, long commentId, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String contents)
      Add new sub comment to existing comment.
      void deleteSubComment​(long postId, long commentId, long subCommentId, java.lang.String username, AuthorityEnum authority)
      Delete existing sub comment. note that user with ADMIN authority should can delete all comments
      void updateSubComment​(long postId, long commentId, long subCommentId, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String contest)
      Update existing sub comment. note that even user with ADMIN authority should not be able to update other comments

    • Method Detail

      • addNewSubComment

        void addNewSubComment​(long postId,
                      long commentId,
                      java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String contents)
               throws pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.CommentNotFoundException
        Add new sub comment to existing comment.
        Parameters:
        postId - Specified post which comment belong.
        commentId - Specified comment which to we are trying add sub comment
        username - Specified username that are adding new sub comment
        contents - Specified contents
        Throws:
        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.CommentNotFoundException - when comment which id not exists or it not belong to specified post.

      • deleteSubComment

        void deleteSubComment​(long postId,
                      long commentId,
                      long subCommentId,
                      java.lang.String username,
                      AuthorityEnum authority)
               throws pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.CommentNotFoundException,
                      pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.NoAuthException
        Delete existing sub comment. note that user with ADMIN authority should can delete all comments
        Parameters:
        postId - Specified post which comment belong.
        commentId - Specified comment which from we are trying delete sub comment.
        subCommentId - Specified sub comment which are we trying delete
        username - Specified username which are trying delete sub comment
        authority - Specified user authority
        Throws:
        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.CommentNotFoundException - when comment or sub comment are not exists.
        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.NoAuthException - when user which sub comment not belong try to delete it
        See Also:
        for more clarification about Authority.

      • updateSubComment

        void updateSubComment​(long postId,
                      long commentId,
                      long subCommentId,
                      java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String contest)
               throws pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.CommentNotFoundException,
                      pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.NoAuthException
        Update existing sub comment. note that even user with ADMIN authority should not be able to update other comments
        Parameters:
        postId - Specified post which comment belong.
        commentId - Specified comment which to we are trying update sub comment
        subCommentId - Specified sub comment which are we trying update
        username - Specified username which are trying update sub comment
        contest - Specified contest
        Throws:
        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.CommentNotFoundException - when comment or sub comment are not exists.
        pl.programmersrest.blog.model.exceptions.custom.NoAuthException - when user which sub comment not belong try to update it
